beer.beer_description: Hawkers West Coast IPA meets Blackman's Juicy Banger. If these two LEGENDARY beers had a baby... this would be it. So many hops & just the right amount of bitterness. A piney, tropical explosion of West Coast Juicy Power!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 5 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 40 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 9!

items.badge_description:
Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 30 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 7!

user.bio: Crawley born. Norfolk emigre. If it’s beer it’ll most likely get a score over 4.

items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 45 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 10!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 380 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 77! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 5 years on Untappd!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 335 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 68! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 360 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 73!

items.checkin_comment: Not sure if I would call this juicy, but it’s a good west coast IPA. Dank in smell and piney in taste

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
